title: q
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The q tag defines a short quotation.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: A simple q tag with a quote

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: A q tag with a cite attribute
usageExamples.code: <q cite="https://www.example.com">This is a quote with a citation</q>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/q @cite="https://www.example.com"
	This is a quote with a citation
